argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | vczcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` W ) |
| 2 |  | vczcl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | vczcl.3 | |- Z = ( GId ` G ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_vcgrp | |- ( W e. CVecOLD -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z G A ) = A ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z G A ) = A ) |
